Class GaloisFields

java.lang.Object
GaloisFields
public class GaloisFields extends Object
Generates discrete Galois multiplication and addition tables

  • Method Details

    • galoisFieldMultiplication

      public int[][] galoisFieldMultiplication(int p, int m)
      Galois fields of base p, power m
      Parameters:
      p - base of Galois field, must be prime to work correctly
      m - exponent of Galois field base, can be any integer > 1
      Returns:
      discrete Galois Field (p,m)

    • galoisFieldAddition

      public int[][] galoisFieldAddition(int gridSize)
      Galois addition table, equivalent to (row xor column), also represents complex multiplication
      Parameters:
      gridSize - can be a prime, or a prime power
      Returns:
      Galois addition table

    • generateTable

      public int[][] generateTable(int p, int m, boolean shifted)
      Wrapper function that produces a table used to sum the multiplications of the coefficients of a solution from ECApathPermutations
      Parameters:
      p - must be prime to work correctly
      m - power of p, p^m
      shifted - shifts the table to exclude the zeros of a Galois Field, shifting by one row up and one column left and subtracting one
      Returns:
      an integer array that is used to sum the results of the multiplications

    • numFactorsRequiredForIdentity

      public void numFactorsRequiredForIdentity()
      Checks how many factors are required to produce an identity array diagonal with Galois multiplication tables. Hypercomplex tables

    • checkNumFactorIdentities

      public void checkNumFactorIdentities(int p, int m, int numFactors)
      Util class of numFactorsRequiredForIdentity()
      Parameters:
      p - prime number
      m - exponent
      numFactors - number of factors to consider
